有价值的，值得考虑的：considerable: 沉重的：great weight；沉闷无聊的：unpleasantly dull
仔细浏览，仔细研究：read or study attentively
预兆性的，凶兆的：sign of evil；勾起兴趣的，令人遐想的：eliciting amazement
故作姿态的，不真诚的人：affected insincere
前提条件：starting point；假定为真：assume true
姿势，姿态：way of holding the body；故作姿态，装模作样：pretended attitude
饮品，尤指有酒精饮料：beverage；适于饮用的：suitable for drinking
（尤指撅嘴或板着脸）表示不悦：show displeasure
危险的，不稳定的：lacking security, stability；可疑的，不明确的：uncertain
匆忙的：careless speed；促使，导致：cause to happen
沉积物，尤指降水：deposit, rain, snow；仓促：disorderly speed
非常陡峭的：steep；匆忙的：careless speed
预先阻止：make impossible in advance；排斥：exclude
预先占有：seize, before others；替换：replace
整理（羽毛）：smooth feathers；打扮修饰：dress oneself elaborate；自满：take pride
重要的，意味深长的：full of meaning；怀孕的：containing offspring
非常关系，全神贯注：extreme concern
占优势的，更重要的：superior importance
给人好感的，有魅力的：impress favorably
荒谬的，不符合常理的：contrary common sense
征兆：sign or warning；预示，预言：predict
放肆的，冒昧的：overstepping bounds；傲慢的：feeling of superiority
虚假，伪装：pretending deceive；自大，优越感：exaggerated sense of one’s importance
主要的，重要的：highest importance, rank
纯净的，质朴的，未被文明腐蚀的：pure, free from dirt or decay
巨大的：great in size；惊人的，了不起的：astonishment
亵渎：treat abuse, irreverence, contempt；滥用：bad or improper use
挥金如土的，挥霍的：wasteful；败家子：spends money freely；堕落的人：below the normal moral standard
禁止的，阻止的：prohibit, restrain；（价格高得）抑制购买的：purchase
快速繁殖；激增：grow or multiply by rapidly offspring
校对：find errors and mark corrections
礼节：conformity socially acceptable；适当，得体：suitable or fitting
单调的，常见的：normal course of events
探查，勘探：go into discovery；期待，期望的事物：looking forward to
成功的，繁盛的：vigorous growth, well-being
平躺（的），使平躺：lying flat；衰弱的，使衰竭：weakness
善变的；多才多艺的：diversity, variety, versatile
节俭的：frugal, economical；有远见的：awareness for the future
激怒：incite anger；驱使，激起：stir feeling
